Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the sale of children’s products containing certain chemicals
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Sale of children’s products containing certain chemicals.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the United States Consumer Product Safety Commission to establish lower total content levels of regulated chemicals for children’s toys and to establish consistent standards for all children’s products
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Establish lower total content levels of regulated chemicals for children’s toys and to establish consistent standards for all children’s products.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the sale of children’s products containing certain chemicals
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
Items.MatterName: Sale of children’s products containing certain chemicals.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the sale of children’s products containing certain chemicals
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Sale of children’s products containing certain chemicals.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the United States Consumer Product Safety Commission to establish lower total content levels of regulated chemicals for children’s toys and to establish consistent standards for all children’s products
Items.ActionName: P-C Item Laid Over by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was P-C Item Laid Over by Comm
Items.MatterName: Establish lower total content levels of regulated chemicals for children’s toys and to establish consistent standards for all children’s products.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Richards and Greenfield
